de.uniks.se1ss19teamb.rbsg.textures

Class TextureManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uniks.se1ss19teamb.rbsg.textures.TextureManager

  • public class TextureManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all texture creations including additional features like minimap computation.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        Initializes the texture manager. Sets the class's instance. Calls AnimatedTexture.registerAnimUpdates(). Creates instances for all game textures. Sets the textures' colors for the minimap.

      • getTextureInstance

        public static javafx.scene.layout.Pane getTextureInstance(java.lang.String toFetch,
                                                          java.lang.String color)
        Texture pane getter.
        Parameters:
        toFetch - Texture name that is requested.
        color - Name of the color around the border of the non-transparent parts of the texture.
        Returns:
        Pane with the requested texture.

      • getTextureInstanceWithSize

        public static javafx.scene.layout.Pane getTextureInstanceWithSize(java.lang.String toFetch,
                                                                  double heigth,
                                                                  double width)

      • computeMinimap

        public static javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas computeMinimap(java.util.Map<javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>,EnvironmentTile> map,
                                                        double size,
                                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UnitTile> unitTileMapByTileId)
        Creates the game's minimap.
        Parameters:
        map - Source of the environment data.
        size - The minimap's target size.
        unitTileMapByTileId - Source of the unit data.
        Returns:
        A canvas that represents the map's textures, including units.

      • computeTerrainTextureInstance

        public static javafx.scene.layout.Pane computeTerrainTextureInstance(java.util.Map<javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>,EnvironmentTile> map,
                                                                     int x,
                                                                     int y)
        Creates a layered terrain texture.
        Parameters:
        map - Map of the gamefield.
        x - Horizontal position.
        y - Vertical position.
        Returns:
        A layered terrain texture.

        Texture dimension getter.

        Returns:
